section1.slide3_sub: We provide awesome and delicious food

section2.desc1: Whatever your occasion, We makes it one to remember!
section2.desc2: One of the best restaurants in the arab region that serves healthy food. We believed that healthy or diet food with great taste was possible and each day that is what we deliver to our customers. Low Calories Restaurant offers fresh nutritious food, with new ideas, new flavors and sauces.
section2.desc3: OUR GOAL: To let everyone enjoy our healthy delicious meals and gain all the benefits and reap all the rewards that go with it

section3.desc: We serve a daily changing menu. We serve our best food.

meal1.title: French toast
meal1.desc: A classic breakfast dish made by dipping slices of bread into a mixture of beaten eggs and milk, then frying until golden brown. Often served with toppings like maple syrup, powdered sugar, and fresh fruits.

meal2.title: Crazy chicken sandwich
meal2.desc: A delicious sandwich featuring tender grilled or fried chicken breast topped with a variety of flavorful ingredients such as lettuce, tomato, cheese, bacon, and various sauces, all served between two slices of bread.

meal3.title: Greek salad
meal3.desc: A refreshing and healthy salad made with fresh vegetables like cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, and bell peppers, typically accompanied by Kalamata olives and feta cheese, all dressed with olive oil and oregano.

meal4.title: Dynamite shrimps
meal4.desc: Thai rice noodles stir-fried with bean curd, Chinese chives, peanuts, and bean sprouts in a special homemade sauce, creating a flavorful and slightly spicy dish that's often enjoyed as a staple of Thai cuisine.

meal5.title: Grilled steak
meal5.desc: A succulent piece of steak, often seasoned with a blend of herbs and spices, and then cooked on a grill to achieve a perfect balance of smoky flavor on the outside and juicy tenderness on the inside.

meal6.title: Halloumi sandwich
meal6.desc: A delightful sandwich featuring slices of halloumi cheese, a semi-hard cheese with a high melting point, often grilled or pan-fried and served within the sandwich along with fresh vegetables and condiments.

meal7.title: Salmon with avocado
meal7.desc: A wholesome dish that combines the rich flavors of salmon with the creaminess of avocado. The salmon is usually grilled or baked to perfection and served with slices of ripe avocado, offering a delightful contrast of textures and tastes.

meal8.title: Salmon sushi
meal8.desc: A popular type of sushi featuring fresh, high-quality salmon as a topping. The salmon can be served as sashimi (sliced raw fish) on top of bite-sized portions of vinegared rice, often accompanied by soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

overview1.title: PREPARED FRESH
overview1.desc: Our meals are prepared and delivered fresh daily. We use special bags to preserve the delicious taste and quality of the food.

overview2.title: LOW CALORIES
overview2.desc: We deliver our meal plans daily, all you have to do is to keep them in the fridge and heat when you are ready for a delicious healthy meal.

overview3.title: DAILY DELIVERY
overview3.desc: Our delivery time is from 10AM-10PM daily except Fridays.

section5.desc1: Low Calories is a leading healthy food restaurants chain with over 35 branches.
section5.desc2: Our goal is to make healthy eating accessible for everyone.

suggestions.title: Suggestions
suggestions.desc: We appreciate all your suggestions, ideas and feedback

footer.desc: We each have different schedules and life pressures that might affect our nutritional choices. So, living a healthy and balanced lifestyle can be both challenging and time consuming. If you want to commit to a healthier lifestyle, you don't have to devote two hours a day to cooking, and spend all your time figuring out what is healthy and what is not. Instead, simply subscribe to our monthly meal packages and live the healthy lifestyle you deserve...

section1.title: Newsletter
section1.desc: Subscribe to our newsletter keeps you up-to-date!

copyright.desc: All right reserved by The Low Calories.
